content: अवतंसः --सं [अव-तंस्-घञ्] {@--1@} A garland. {@--2@} An ear-ing, a ring-shaped ornament, an ear-ornament (<ab>fig.</ab> also); गणां नमेरुप्रसवावतंसाः <ls>Ku. 1. 55</ls>; स्ववाहनक्षोभचलावतंसाः <ls n="Ku.">7. 38</ls>; चंदनपल्लवावतंसां <ls>K. 11</ls>, <ls n="K.">12</ls>, <ls n="K.">140</ls>, <ls n="K.">97</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 49</ls>; <ls>Dk. 5</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">88</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 11</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 81</ls>; °उत्पलं a lotus used as an ornament; <ls>Ku. 4. 8</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> with अ omitted; यैर्वतंसकुसुमैः प्रियमेताः <ls>Śi. 10. 67.</ls> {@--3@} An ornament worn on the head, crest; (<ab>fig.</ab>) anything that serves as an ornament; ‘decked with’; तामरसावतंसा जलसंनिवेशाः <ls>Chāt. 2. 3</ls>; पुंडरीकावतंसाभिः परिखाभिः <ls>Rām.</ls>; पुष्पावतंसं सलिलं <ls>Suśr.</ls>; कल्याणावतंसा कल्याणसंपद् <ls>Māl. 6.</ls>

अवतंसः --सं [अव-तंस्-घञ्] {@--1@} A garland. {@--2@} An ear-ing, a ring-shaped ornament, an ear-ornament (<ab>fig.</ab> also); गणां नमेरुप्रसवावतंसाः <ls>Ku. 1. 55</ls>; स्ववाहनक्षोभचलावतंसाः <ls n="Ku.">7. 38</ls>; चंदनपल्लवावतंसां <ls>K. 11</ls>, <ls n="K.">12</ls>, <ls n="K.">140</ls>, <ls n="K.">97</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 49</ls>; <ls>Dk. 5</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">88</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 11</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 81</ls>; °उत्पलं a lotus used as an ornament; <ls>Ku. 4. 8</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> with अ omitted; यैर्वतंसकुसुमैः प्रियमेताः <ls>Śi. 10. 67.</ls> {@--3@} An ornament worn on the head, crest; (<ab>fig.</ab>) anything that serves as an ornament; ‘decked with’; तामरसावतंसा जलसंनिवेशाः <ls>Chāt. 2. 3</ls>; पुंडरीकावतंसाभिः परिखाभिः <ls>Rām.</ls>; पुष्पावतंसं सलिलं <ls>Suśr.</ls>; कल्याणावतंसा कल्याणसंपद् <ls>Māl. 6.</ls>
